frontmatter.title: LTE: why are high frequencies faster than low frequencies?
frontmatter.description: While theoretical speed on different frequencies are identical on LTE, this is very rarely the case in the real world. Why is that?

items.title: How does the distance affect LTE?
Why does greater coverage result in lower speeds?
